bibl.seg: YOUTIE Louise C., [Michigan Papyri. Volume XVII.] P. Michigan XVII. The Michigan Medical Codex (P. Mich. 758 = P. Mich. inv. 21). (American Studies in Papyrology. 35.)
Atlanta, Georgia, Scholars Press, 1996, 4°, xxv-87 pp., tabl. et 13 pll. ISBN 0-7885-0276-X. $39.95.
